Welcome to inboxkitten's documentation!
=======================================

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

Inboxkitten is an open-source disposable email service that you can freely deploy adopt on your own!

Visit `our site <https://inboxkitten.com/>`_ to give a spin or run it on your local machine!

Indices and tables
==================

* :ref:`Setting Up Docker <dockerSetUp>`
* :ref:`genindex`
* :ref:`modindex`
* :ref:`search`
